name: Angel I

audio.name: Dashed dreams and hopes for the future
Dashed dreams and hopes for the future 1
Why he, and others like him, get into trouble

bio:
Angel 
Male, Age 19
Crossed the border at 6 with mother seeking family reunification
US high school junior; US occupation: Construction Worker
Detained and Deported by ICE at 18 after imprisonment for a felony
Left behind: parents, siblings
Mexican occupation: window cleaner
